title: Taiwan Lifers Cut FX Protection, Fueling Slump in Hedging Costs
description: The cost for Taiwanese investors to hedge against a weaker greenback slumped to the lowest since 2016 as local life insurers pared such wagers following an overhaul of accounting rules.
content: The cost for Taiwanese investors to hedge against a weaker greenback slumped to the lowest since 2016 as local life insurers pared such wagers following an overhaul of accounting rules.
